Pre-Game Insights: The Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium is one of the best batting tracks of the country, and we can expect a high-scoring encounter.
This is a flat surface with absolutely no help for the bowlers, be it pace or spin.
A total of three T20Is have been played at this ground, where the average 1st innings score has been 183 runs. Out of three matches, two of them have been won by the chasing teams.
In terms of bowling, Yuzvendra Chahal found some success when he played here.
